sentences.sContent: No one told me about any briefcase.
sentences.sContent_eng: No one told me about any briefcase.
sentences.sCn: 没有人和我提过什么公文包。

sentences.sContent: If you ask about my impression on him, I feel he looks like a typical businessman, you know, dark suit and briefcase.
sentences.sContent_eng: If you ask about my impression on him, I feel he looks like a typical businessman, you know, dark suit and briefcase.
sentences.sCn: 如果你问我对他的印象如何，我感觉他看起来像是个典型的商人，你知道，黑西装和公文包的那种。

sentences.sContent: Dennis peered into the room and saw her take a small red object out of her briefcase and quickly hide it in the bottom drawer of her dresser.
sentences.sContent_eng: Dennis peered into the room and saw her take a small red object out of her briefcase and quickly hide it in the bottom drawer of her dresser.
sentences.sCn: 丹尼斯窥视着房间里的一举一动，只见她从公文包里拿出一个红色的小东西，快速地把它藏在梳妆台最底下的抽屉里。

remMethod.val: brief(简捷的) + case(手提箱) → 简捷的手提箱 → 公文包

trans.tranOther: a flat case used especially by business people for carrying papers or documents
